ComicInfo.Summary:
We see the Triceratons battle in space, Donatello is trapped in an alternate reality fighting the Shredder as Robin Hood, April is seen running into trouble with some Hell's Angels and Master Splinter meets Gyogi who brings news about Leonardo's recent disappearance.
This is the last issue of Vol 4 of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and was not released in stores. Instead it was only published on Peter Laird's blog for free. The issue ends on a cliffhanger, however the conclusion has never come to surface.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 14:20:06. [CVDB293382]

ComicInfo.Characters: April O'Neil, Casey Jones, Donatello, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Shredder
